body_en:
The target have now more close to a sub-site thing than before with those variables which can be set per target:

  • locales: Languages and they order
  • hostPattern: how to generate host in lnaguage switch menu
  • canonicals: live base url per locale, i.e. doc.elasticms.be vs. www.elasticms.eu
  • isLive:
  • searchTemplate: 'top', 'left' or not defined per target
  • simpleTaxonomies: Taxonomies to list
  • groupedTaxonomies:
  • wyiwygReplaces: array of replaces in wysiwyg fields
  • cdnSiteId: 
  • matomoSiteIds : One id per env i.e. { live:23 }
  • footerMenu: OUUID of the footer menu
label: [doc] News approach with a configuration set par target
summary_en: Even in a multi-target website it's possible to have differents configs in terms of locales, search, footer, ....
title_en: News approach with a configuration set par target
